weather_report:
As the evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, the city basks in a cloak of stillness, with clear skies and a soothing chill in the air. The low temperature skims around 51 degrees, inviting an extra layer to keep the warmth. Gentle whispers of wind, barely perceptible at two miles per hour, carry the crisp scent of the bay, while the view from elevated perches reveals a horizon unmarred by fog. The Golden Gate Bridge stands proud against the darkening skyline, accentuating the city’s iconic silhouette.

Tomorrow promises a sun-drenched day heralding temperatures that will climb to a pleasant 65 degrees, mellowing as the afternoon approaches. It’s the sort of day which beckons residents outdoors, perhaps for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the sun glistens on the waters of the bay, or a quiet visit to one of the hidden treasures in the city’s parks. As the sun climbs higher, a light breeze will offer refreshment, ideal for casual afternoons spent sipping coffee in an outdoor café or browsing the local boutiques. A light sweater or a light jacket should suffice to navigate the transitions of this tranquil, golden day. Embrace the mundane moments of joy; there’s beauty in an ordinary San Francisco day.
